content: Hi. Need advice in case anyone wants to give: I'm using Tokyo. should I get Rio?
It's not really very different. A little more stable in 64bit? not sure.
I'm not going to use any of the lovely new language features

Just a question about Embarcadero and the RAD server they offer, it looks a bit interesting, but I guess they don't have any plans for this to support FHIR so I guess it's a waste of time to look into that if we also need to support FHIR?
I don't know. you could ask them. They've sniffed around talking to me, but it's never actually happend.
